name: Traceur
description:
Traceur is a Brutal 1 Bit Autorunner made for LOWREZJAM 2017.

The game was inspired by the likes of Canabalt and Jetpack Joyride as well as Bit Trip Runner. It was made in 3 Days.

All of the art and music was made by Leon Arndt @NeoTalon

The game has six levels of increasing difficulty and a ruthless finale.

It was made to be as accessible as possible. Because of this it is a single button game which can be played with an on-screen keyboard (see https://www.includification.com/)

The 16:9 aspect ratio was faked by stretching pixels horizontally.
